name: Yes, Domina - Alpha Version 0.1
description:
Yes, Domina is an erotic, text-based fantasy game, in which you play as a slave in the household of a matriarchal noblewoman and her two adult daughters. Complete your daily chores to win her favor, or misbehave and be punished...

Yes, Domina is part of Hyperlore, a universe of interconnected erotic games and stories. This is a work in progress, with little erotic content currently. Check back frequently for updates, and support continued development by supporting Hyperlore on Patreon!
